name: FNAF:Endless Nights With Freddy...
description:
Welcome, welcome!

This is a retro-styled recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's made by Scott Cawthon and published on 2014. This game has been made by Bryan Afton!

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • Zombies will attack you along with bears, snakes, bats, earthquakes, hurricanes and ghosts...
  • But don't forget in this game the higher the level the more freaks will appear...
  • Help Freddy survive nights with different types of freaks like you....
  • Survive as long as possible in this game made in 1 day...

CONTROLS:

  • MOUSE.
  • BRAIN.

WARNINGS:

  • THIS IS A FAN-MADE PROJECT CREATED FOR FUN PURPOSES ONLY, AND SHALL NOT BE SOLD IN ANY OCCASION.
  • THIS IS A GAME BASED ON A GAME WITHIN FIVE NIGHT AT FREDDY MADE BY SCOTT CAWTHON.

#retro #fnaf #horror #pointnclick #survival #puzzle #action #adventure #fangame #strategy #fnf
